com.vangav.backend.exceptions.handlers

Class ArgumentsInl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.exceptions.handlers.ArgumentsInl

  • public class ArgumentsInl
extends java.lang.Object
    ArgumentsInl handles throwing exceptions for illegal arguments
